main event: A UFO sighting involving a bright yellow light observed moving at high speed on 18 October 1956.
interesting points: The light flared up against a background light and then burned out,The light dropped straight down and flared up again,The object appeared to move at a high rate of speed toward the west,The sighting caused considerable excitement and was noted as not being an aircraft,There are multiple hypotheses about the nature of the sighting, including it possibly being a balloon or an aircraft.
witness description: a pilot who reported the sighting
